locations: Several workers in the foreground are not wearing hard hats or gloves.
Workers are near scattered debris, which poses a trip hazard in the center of the site.
Loose materials and equipment are strewn across the working area.
recommendations: Ensure all workers are wearing appropriate PPE including hard hats and gloves.
Clear up the debris and organize materials to prevent trips and falls.
Store equipment and materials properly to maintain a safe working environment.
